mutants.code:
import re

def find_font_styles(html):
    html = re.sub('', '', html, flags=re.DOTALL)
    html = re.sub('<script.*?</script>', '', html, flags=re.DOTALL)
    html = re.sub('<style.*?</style>', '', html, flags=re.DOTALL)
    font_style_tags = re.findall('<(b|i|u|s|strong|em|ins|del)>', html, flags=re.IGNORECASE)
    font_styles = set(map(str.lower, font_style_tags))
    return font_styles

import re

def find_font_styles(html):
    html = re.sub('<!--.*?-->', 'MUTATED', html, flags=re.DOTALL)
    html = re.sub('<script.*?</script>', '', html, flags=re.DOTALL)
    html = re.sub('<style.*?</style>', '', html, flags=re.DOTALL)
    font_style_tags = re.findall('<(b|i|u|s|strong|em|ins|del)>', html, flags=re.IGNORECASE)
    font_styles = set(map(str.lower, font_style_tags))
    return font_styles

import re

def find_font_styles(html):
    html = re.sub('<!--.*?-->', '', html, flags=re.DOTALL)
    html = re.sub('<script.*?</script>', '', html, flags=re.DOTALL)
    html = re.sub('<style.*?</style>', '', html, flags=re.DOTALL)
    font_style_tags = re.findall('', html, flags=re.IGNORECASE)
    font_styles = set(map(str.lower, font_style_tags))
    return font_styles
